item.title: Jaime add a quote by —Victor Frankl
item.description: " The last of the human freedoms is to choose one's attitudes." -- —Victor Frankl

item.title: Jaime add a quote by Victor Frankl
item.description: "Forces beyond your control can take away everything you possess except one thing, your freedom to choose how you will respond to the situation." -- Victor Frankl

item.title: Jaime add a quote by Viktor E. Frankl
item.description: "When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves." -- Viktor E. Frankl

item.title: Jaime add a quote by Louise Erdrich
item.description: "We do know that no one gets wise enough to really understand the heart of another, though it is the task of our life to try." -- Louise Erdrich

item.title: Jaime add a quote by Kim Harrison
item.description: "That's why I want you there, he said. You're unpredictable, and that can be the difference between success and failure. Most people make decisions in anger, fear, love, or obligation. You make decisions to irritate people." -- Kim Harrison

item.title: Jaime add a quote by Gregory Maguire
item.description: "People who claim that they're evil are usually no worse than the rest of us... It's people who claim that they're good, or any way better than the rest of us, that you have to be wary of." -- Gregory Maguire

item.title: Jaime add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "Let us read, and let us dance; these two amusements will never do any harm to the world." -- Voltaire

item.title: Jaime add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "‎Life is a shipwreck, but we must not forget to sing in the lifeboats." -- Voltaire

item.title: Jaime add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "Judge a man by his questions rather than by his answers." -- Voltaire

item.title: Jaime add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "The more I read, the more I acquire, the more certain I am that I know nothing." -- Voltaire

item.title: Jaime add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "Doubt is an uncomfortable condition, but certainty is a ridiculous one." -- Voltaire
